sections.purpose: To outline the procedure for performing analysis using High Performance Thin Layer Chromatography.
sections.scope: Applicable to qualitative and quantitative analysis in Pharmaceutical Analysis laboratory.
procedure: Prepare the mobile phase as per experimental requirement.
Activate and mark the TLC plate.
Apply standard and sample solutions using applicator.
Saturate the development chamber with mobile phase.
Develop the plate to the specified distance.
Dry the plate and scan using densitometer.
sections.precautions: Avoid touching the plate surface. Ensure uniform application of samples.
